skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 1 turn. The chance increases by 0.75% for every 1% of HP this Champion loses.
skills.name: Spirits of Spite
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Puts the target’s skills on cooldown. 

If the enemy team has any duplicates of the target Champion, will also put all their skills on cooldown.
skills.name: Dead Stop
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +100%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of removing 2 random buffs. Has a 75% chance of decreasing all enemies’ Turn Meters by 20%. Decreases enemy Turn Meters by a further 0.2% for every 1% of HP this Champion loses.
skills.name: Ghost Rage
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +100%

skills.desc:
Prevents this Champion’s death and keeps them alive on 1 HP when hit by a fatal hit.

If this skill prevents this Champion’s death, heals them by 10% of their MAX HP, fills their Turn Meter by 20%, and places a [Shield] buff on them equal to 30% of their MAX HP for 2 turns.

Will not prevent this Champion’s death if they are under a [Heal Reduction] debuff.
skills.name: Spurned by Death [P]
